originalText.text: Dr. K. Grimm has treated both my sons since they were newborns.  The oldest is 20 and youngest 18 y/o now. As a parent I couldn't be happier with her professionalism, experience, her approach to medications and her love for children. Both will dearly miss her when they reach the max. age. She is an amazing human being...

originalText.text: Dr.Grimm is seeing my 7 yr old since he was a baby. I always trust her opinions. She is pretty gentle with little ones. Very knowledgeable and a good listener to a mom's worries and concerns. Even my boy has his own opinion about her, " I like dr.Grimm".

text.text: Dr.Grimm is seeing my 7 yr old since he was a baby. I always trust her opinions. She is pretty gentle with little ones. Very knowledgeable and a good listener to a mom's worries and concerns. Even my boy has his own opinion about her, " I like dr.Grimm".

originalText.text: I don’t know how people even get to meet doctor Grimm. To me it seems she doesn’t even exists. We have been trying to get an appointment with her literally 9 times over the past 3 months but there is always an excuse to why she is so incredibly busy. My son has 105 in fever today and I would have really appriciated not having to go into the city with him. But as usual she doesn’t have time. The front desk lady asked if we were already patients and I almost wanted to yell at her ‘how would we be patients when you never have time to see us’. I felt like if we were already patients she would’ve made time for us. Add to that that she always seems rude when I talk to her on the phone. I wouldn’t recommend going through the stress of trying to see this doctor, especially if your child is already sick.

originalText.text:
Amazing doctor!
The best doctor we could ask for our child.
carrying, loving, giving and very professional.

originalText.text: We love her. Lots of experience. Very pragmatic. Very friendly and fantastic with kids!
